group_1.textRight: Hiiii, Instructor.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, Your Highness, you're here. Welcome.

group_1.textRight: I'm used to coming to Takarazaki after@that incident.
If you two are officially joining us, of course@this cutie would at least visit you.
But even so, it's totally like a funeral here.

group_1.textLeft: After all, the festival was canceled because@of that incident...
The adults didn't even understand what they'd@done. They just cleared out, dumbfounded.

group_1.textRight: So, that's why Miyurin's been bawling her eyes out?@'Cause she can't deal with it?
Don't you really wanna cry too, instructor?

group_1.textLeft: Naturally. It was my everything.
But right now, we must keep facing forward@in order to resurrect it.

group_1.textRight: Resurrect?

group_1.textLeft: If we allow this state to continue, the festival will@eventually fade away...
That's why we need to move quickly.

group_1.textRight: For the supremacy of Magical Girls...?

group_1.textLeft: Through that, I'll become a living god.

group_1.textRight: Except THIS cutie will be the one on top.

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle* Then I suppose I'll come second in@the hierarchy of the gods.

group_1.textRight: Then, I'm cool with that.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, understood.

group_1.textRight: So I get why the instructor's officially joined us.
But what about you, Miyurin? You still coming?

group_1.textLeft: *Sob*...of course...
I'll serve as Lady San's weapon to help her@become a god.
And the festival is important to me too,@so we have to make it happen...

group_1.textRight: Cool, then let's become gods together.

group_1.textLeft: So, what are the others doing now?

group_1.textRight: She wasn't around for all this, but Sasha's@coming back.

group_1.textLeft: What was she doing?

group_1.textRight: She rounded up some friends from back home,@around 10 of 'em.

group_1.textLeft: We'll have to get in touch with them, too...
What about Miyabi and Azumi?

group_1.textRight: Oh yeah, Miwarin woke up and they went to@visit her.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, thank goodness!
*Hic*...That was really...a shock for her,@wasn't it...

group_1.textRight: She's just trying to survive in her own way...
Jun...Jun...

group_1.textLeft: Hey, Miwarin, your Soul Gem...!
I understand how you feel, but you must@calm down!

group_1.textRight: Don't tell me to calm down!
The one person...who changed me...
The one person...truly important...to me...
I have to fulfill our promise...to see each other@in Paradise, at the Tomorrow Shop

group_1.textLeft: That's not true!
Jun protected you because you're@important to her...!
Because she wanted to change with you...!

group_1.textRight: Yeah...you can carry on Jun's wishes here...
I know we can't make up for everything, but...
Let's change together...
What you've been trying to achieve with Jun,@let's aim for it together...!
Yeah, you're right...I understand that in theory...

group_1.textLeft: In theory...?

group_1.textRight: But emotionally, there's no way I can do it...@I want to die already...

group_1.textLeft: That's...

group_1.textRight: That's why...

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?
